markdownRemark.excerpt: This is the method I used to create this blog in just a few hours (the content took quite a bit longer). Things You Need To Get Started…
markdownRemark.html:
This is the method I used to create this blog in just a few hours (the content took quite a bit longer).

Things You Need To Get Started

  • Domain name (technically not free but…)

  • Cloudflare CDN Account

  • Google Cloud account

  • GitHub account

  • Google Analytics Account

  • Google Cloud Build (120 minutes per day)

  • Google Cloud Storage (5gb free per month)

frontmatter.title: Hosting a blog on Google Cloud for free (mostly)
